Developer Terms of Use
des:
Scale Helper will help you master your scales and arpeggios. Just ask for a scale or arpeggio, set the speed and practice along with Alexa. With regular use, Scale Helper will improve the tuning and rhythmic accuracy of your scales as well as the fluency of your technical work.

To get started, say “Alexa, open Scale Helper”. 

Scale Helper will play major, harmonic minor, melodic minor scales or major, minor, dominant 7th and diminished 7th arpeggios in one or two octaves at four different speeds from very slow, slow, moderate and fast. 

Try saying:
· “Alexa, ask Scale Helper to play G major scale, fast over two octaves.”
· “Alexa, ask Scale Helper to play B minor arpeggio, very slow.”

The Scale Helper skill is easy to use, suitable for all instruments and is a helpful practice companion for when your teacher can’t be there to guide you along. 

This skill has been designed with the Australian Music Examinations Board (AMEB), to be a helpful practice tool for students of any kind, whether preparing for an exam or learning just for fun!
